resources.string: There are five cards laid out, and you are to guess if the next card is higher or lower - ace being the highest card, and two being lowest./nThe first card can be changed if you wish./nIf your guess is correct you continue with the next card./n/nCorrectly guessing all cards to the end wins the game./nThe Full Deck Game has the same rules but uses the full deck rather than just five cards./nRemember, you get nothing for a pair, not in this game.
